program_detail:
博士课程的研究和学术机会涵盖了应用数学中广泛相互关联的领域，这些领域反映了该系教师不同的科学兴趣。这些包括：

数据科学，侧重于理论基础、建模技术和算法开发。
概率和统计，侧重于理论和应用，特别是与机器学习相关的知识。
金融数学，以及专注于优化/运筹学，解决离散和连续优化问题。
离散数学，重点是组合学和图论。
计算和应用数学，重点是为流体动力学、形状分析和生物医学工程中的各种应用开发数学和数值模型。
academic_background: 最好完成工程学，数学，科学，金融*或经济学*的学士学位。此外，理想的候选人应完成本科课程：微积分，通过多变量微积分；线性代数；微分方程；概率和统计；微观经济学和宏观经济学*；计算机编程（例如，在C ++中）
material_requirements: Official transcripts ；Three letters of recommendation；Resume or curriculum vitae；Personal statement
more_info:
• Core research in Data Science, Probability/Statistics, Financial Mathematics, and Computational/Applied Mathematics.
• Interdisciplinary focus: computational medicine research via partnership with JHU's Institute for Computational Medicine.
• Internship Network in Mathematical Sciences (INMAS) for careers in business, industry, and government.
tags: Applied Mathematics, Statistics, Interdisciplinary, Data Science, Machine Learning
grad_requirement: A doctoral dissertation, an Introductory Examination, a Ph.D. Candidacy Examination, a Graduate Board Oral Examination, and a teaching or research assistantship are required.

program_detail: 数据科学通常被视为 (1) 计算机和信息科学 (2) 统计科学和 (3) 领域专业知识的融合。这三个支柱不是对称的：前两个共同代表数据科学中使用的核心方法和技术，而第三个支柱是应用该方法的应用领域。在该计划中，核心数据科学培训侧重于前两个支柱，以及应用其技能解决应用领域问题的实践。
gre_req: 不要求，但可提交做补充材料

univ_name: University of North Carolina, Chapel Hill
program_name: MS program in Statistics, Analytics and Data Science (STANDS)
program_detail: 为学生提供统计、优化、随机建模和概率领域的严格培训计划。该计划旨在足够灵活，以适应具有不同技术背景和主题兴趣的学生，并允许学生在理论、方法、计算和应用方面进行各种课程。成功完成该计划后的官方硕士学位将显示“统计和运筹学硕士学位
material_requirements: transcripts；Resumes or Curriculum Vitae ；Statement of Purpose； recommendations；
more_info:
• Career-focused curriculum: Prepares students for in-demand data science, analytics, and database administration roles.
• Project-based learning: Culminates in a master's project, covering advanced quantitative methods, machine learning, and ethical data application.
• Flexible online format: Blends asynchronous and synchronous learning for accessible advanced training in data science.
• Industry partnerships: Fosters collaborative learning, translating research into practical applications with external organizations.
• Strong ROI potential: Competitive tuition rates, high employment prospects, and robust job growth in data science fields.
department: Department of Statistics and Operations Research
tags: Statistics, Operations Research, Data Science, Interdisciplinary, Optimization
grad_requirement: Master's project or team-based capstone required.

program_name: Master of Science in Data Science and Analytics
program_detail: 为学生提供计算，数学和统计方法方面的严格培训；在数据分析基础知识方面积累丰富的知识，然后在可视化，大数据计算和机器学习方面增加了技能。沟通，团队合作和解决问题技巧等重要的软技能是整个培训的一部分。
academic_background: 作为申请人，您应该完成以下大学水平课程：要求：多变量微积分（3学分）；必修：线性代数（3学分）；必填项：基于微积分的统计数据（3学分）；要求：计算机编程（3学分，主要语言）；首选：数据结构（3学分）；首选：算法分析与设计（3学分）；本专业广泛使用R和Python，申请人在注册之前应该熟练掌握这些语言。
material_requirements: Recommendations；Transcripts；Statements of Purpose；CV or Résumé
more_info:
• Rigorous curriculum: deep learning, big data, cloud computing, advanced NLP, LLMs, and AI.
• Hands-on experience: research opportunities, Massive Data Institute partnership, and capstone course.
• Strong career outcomes: graduates employed at Amazon, Google, IBM, and top consulting firms.
• Flexible study: full-time or part-time options with evening classes for working professionals.
• DC advantage: access to seminars, internships, and industry adjunct professors.
- Additional deadlines: 1月15日
department: The Graduate School of Arts & Sciences
tags: Data Science, Analytics, Mathematics, Statistics, Interdisciplinary

program_detail: 特别强调将数学分析与统计或概率相结合的那些领域。一些典型的领域包括随机过程，金融数学，计算科学，生物统计学和数据挖掘。
academic_background: 拥有相当于数学（通常是微积分数学一年）的本科学位
material_requirements: Recommendations；Transcripts；Statements of Purpose；CV or Résumé
more_info:
• STEM-designated Master of Science in Mathematics and Statistics, specializing in data science, machine learning, and AI.
• Customizable curriculum provides core mathematical and statistical foundations, plus real-world applications from electives.
• Professional career preparation in stochastic processes, financial mathematics, computational sciences, and data mining.
• No thesis requirement, enabling direct pathways to careers in technology, finance, consulting, and government.
- Additional deadlines: 4月1日
department: The Graduate School of Arts & Sciences
tags: Mathematics, Statistics, Applied Mathematics, Interdisciplinary, Data Science

program_detail: 特别强调将数学分析与统计或概率相结合的那些领域。一些典型的领域包括随机过程，金融数学，计算科学，生物统计学和数据挖掘。

more_info:

• Customizable curriculum provides core foundations in probability, statistical inference, modeling, optimization, and numerical methods, plus diverse electives.
• Hands-on methodological and computational training for data-intensive careers across technology, finance, consulting, and government sectors.
• Professional Master’s without thesis or comprehensive exam requirements, focusing on practical application of mathematical and statistical techniques.
department: The Graduate School of Arts & Sciences
tags: Mathematics, Statistics, Data Science, Machine Learning, Interdisciplinary

program_detail: 旨在培养考虑将数据用于社会公益方式的研究人员。QTM MS课程将包括数据管理和预测建模的标准培训;然而，学生将获得将传统研究与研究设计、理论、因果推理和技术交流相结合的教育。
material_requirements: Writing sample   ；Recommendations；Transcripts；Statements of Purpose；CV or Résumé；
more_info:
• STEM-designated, 12-month program: Unique blend of technical training, rhetorical practice, and hands-on experience.
• Interdisciplinary faculty: Provides access to a vast employer network in business, government, and non-profit sectors.
• Experiential learning opportunities: Features funded research opportunities and data-hacking competitions for skill development.
• Personalized student support: Includes pre-course math training and intimate class sizes for direct faculty attention.
- Additional deadlines: 2月28日
department: Emory College of Arts and Sciences
tags: Quantitative Theory And Methods, Data Science, Statistics, Interdisciplinary, Mathematics
grad_requirement: A Capstone Research Project is required.

program_detail: 博士课程侧重于具有商业应用的数学方法，包括动态规划，博弈论，机制设计，机器学习，优化，搜索理论，人群智慧，预测，决策分析，定价和收入管理，以及人类决策的行为模型。
material_requirements: ESSAY；transcripts；Resumes or Curriculum Vitae ；Statement of Purpose； recommendations
more_info:
• Core research in dynamic programming, game theory, machine learning, optimization, and behavioral decision making.
• Faculty expertise across mechanism design, data-driven optimization, forecasting, and computational social choice.
• Flexible curriculum allowing selection from diverse Ph.D. courses across the UVA campus.
• Strong emphasis on fundamental theory (real analysis, microeconomics) and methods (statistics, econometrics, coding).
tags: Data Analytics, Decision Science, Mathematics, Statistics, Interdisciplinary

program_detail: 学习使用数据科学解决复杂问题的工具和技术，成为该领域的领导者和先驱。学习基本的数据分析主题，如自然语言处理、机器学习、文本分析和深度学习。综合课程将实践学习与健全的数据科学原则的应用相结合，使您能够解决现实世界的问题并成为该领域的领导者。
academic_background: 申请人学科和背景：包括天文学、生物学、商业、计算机科学、工程、经济学、新闻学、语言、数学、护理、公共政策和统计学等。需要强大的定量背景，以及有效的沟通技巧和解决问题的心态。
material_requirements: transcripts；Resumes or Curriculum Vitae ；Statement of Purpose； recommendations
more_info:
• 11-month intensive curriculum, covering natural-language processing, machine learning, and deep learning.
• Team capstone projects sponsored by corporate and government partners.
• Strong industry connections and a global network of 250K+ University alumni.
• STEM-OPT eligible, allowing 12 months of Optional Practical Training and 24 months of extension.
- Additional deadlines: 3月17日
tags: Data Science, Mathematics, Statistics, Programming, Interdisciplinary

program_detail: 旨在传授必要的技能和知识，以实现数据科学方法的研究和发现。由于最终目标是从复杂数据中提取知识并实现发现，因此该计划还拥有面向跨学科合作的强大应用培训。博士生将掌握数据科学的计算和数学基础，培养数据工程、软件开发、数据政策和伦理方面的能力。

program_name: MS in DATA ANALYTICS FOR SCIENCE
program_detail: 学生将能够通过学习科学家的现代编程语言、数学和计算建模、并行计算等计算方法、高性能计算、机器学习技术、信息可视化、统计工具和现代软件包来建立他们的科学知识。
academic_background: 科学数据分析硕士（MS-DAS）课程是为寻求在数据科学的许多方面获得额外技能的学生创建的学位课程。与现有的以计算机科学或工程背景设计的学位课程不同，MS-DAS课程是为具有基础科学背景的学生量身定制的，例如生物学，物理学，数学，化学或相关领域。
material_requirements: Statement of Purpose ； transcript；Resume/CV；Letters of recommendation
more_info:

• Diverse career readiness: prepares graduates for roles in academia, commercial research, and government sectors.

material_requirements: transcripts；Resumes or Curriculum Vitae ；Statement of Purpose； recommendations；
more_info:
The browsed content provides a good overview of the MS Data Science program.

Here's what I've gathered:
*   **Program Type:** Joint professional program between Statistics and Computer Sciences Departments. Coursework-based, not research-based (no thesis required).
*   **Curriculum:** 30 credits covering statistical theories, methodologies, computer systems, algorithms, machine learning, and electives.
*   **Interdisciplinary:** Joint program between Statistics and Computer Sciences, allows combining with domain knowledge to address data-rich problems.
*   **Career Focus:** Graduates seek employment as data analysts and data scientists.
*   **Internship/Practicum:** Students interested in COMP SCI 702 Graduate Cooperative Education course (likely internship/practicum related).
*   **Career Services:** Department of Statistics Student Career Resources page, Graduate School career services, Handshake.
*   **ROI/Outcomes:** STEM-OPT eligible.
*   **Accelerated Pathway:** For UW-Madison alumni in related fields, can complete in one calendar year (3 semesters).
*   **Faculty Strengths/Lab Resources:** Not explicitly detailed in terms of "faculty strengths" or "lab resources" but implies strong departments due to joint nature. "High Throughput Computing Resources" is mentioned under "Computing" section in the menu, but not directly linked to the MS Data Science program itself as a selling point.
*   **Funding:** Limited selective scholarships, but no tuition remission from graduate assistantships as it's a professional program. Students can apply for hourly positions and assistantships for stipends.

Now, I will formulate 3-5 concise bullet points.

*   Joint professional program in Data Science from Statistics and Computer Sciences departments.
*   Curriculum focuses on statistical theories, computational skills, algorithms, and machine learning.
*   Accelerated pathway available for UW-Madison alumni, completing the MS degree in one calendar year.
*   STEM-OPT eligible program, preparing graduates for data analyst and data scientist roles.
*   Opportunities for cooperative education via COMP SCI 702 and access to career resources.

These points are concise, highlight distinct features, and are within the word limit.
• Joint professional program in Data Science from Statistics and Computer Sciences departments.
• Curriculum focuses on statistical theories, computational skills, algorithms, and machine learning.
• Accelerated pathway available for UW-Madison alumni, completing the MS degree in one calendar year.
• STEM-OPT eligible program, preparing graduates for data analyst and data scientist roles.
• Opportunities for cooperative education via COMP SCI 702 and access to career resources.
tags: Data Science, Statistics, Computer Sciences, Interdisciplinary, Machine Learning

program_detail: 将在数学，计算和数据工程方面发展全面的专业知识，以便您可以将您的数据职业生涯提升到一个新的水平。这种跨学科元素意味着您将获得强大而全面的数据科学世界。
gre_req: 不要求，但可提交作为补充材料
academic_background:
申请人背景要求：数学背景
多年的高等数学，包括线性代数、微积分和统计学
编程背景
至少一个编程/编码课程或同等经验
material_requirements: transcripts；Resumes or Curriculum Vitae ；Statement of Purpose； recommendations；
more_info:
The provided program URL for the MS in Data Science at Northeastern University in Silicon Valley (Source 1) and the search results (Sources 2, 3, 4) offer good information.

Here's what I've gathered:
*   **Interdisciplinary Curriculum:** The program is a joint effort between the Khoury College of Computer Sciences and the College of Engineering, offering expertise in computational modeling, data collection/integration, storage, processing, modeling, analytics, and visualization.
*   **Experiential Learning/Co-op:** Northeastern has a strong co-op program, providing master's students with up to 12 months of professional experience (6-8 month co-op or 3-4 month summer internship). This is a significant career-oriented selling point.
*   **Career Outcomes:** Graduates are qualified for roles such as data scientist, machine learning engineer, data architect, data engineer, and business intelligence developer.
*   **Skill Development:** The curriculum focuses on developing strong programming and analysis skills using R and Python, statistical analyses, data mining, machine learning models, and managing/visualizing data at scale.
*   **Flexibility:** Offered in On-Ground, Hybrid, and Online formats.

Now, I will formulate the bullet points based on the gathered information.

• Interdisciplinary curriculum between Computer Sciences and Engineering.
• Extensive co-op program offers up to 12 months of professional experience.
• Develops strong programming, statistical analysis, and machine learning skills.
• Prepares graduates for diverse roles like data scientist and machine learning engineer.
• Available in on-ground, hybrid, and online program formats.
tags: Data Science, Interdisciplinary, Mathematics, Statistics, Programming

将通过运筹学、统计学、数据挖掘、数据库管理和可视化方面的技术先进的核心课程获得严格的分析技能和研究经验。您可以通过来自东北大学不同学科的灵活选修课进一步专业化您的学位，例如：

大数据
智能制造
医疗保健分析
网络科学
机器学习
高级优化
业务分析
物联网
academic_background: 持有以下任何领域学士学位的申请人在学术上有资格考虑录取：应用数学、数学、统计学、物理、化学、计算机科学或定量商业（例如经济学、金融学、信息系统）
material_requirements: transcripts；Resumes or Curriculum Vitae ；Statement of Purpose； recommendations；
more_info:
• Comprehensive training for data analytics roles across healthcare, finance, and manufacturing, emphasizing actionable insights.
• Mandatory research project or thesis for Vancouver campus students ensures in-depth analytical experience.
• Graduate-level Cooperative Education (co-op) program offers 4-8 month professional placements with leading companies.
• Co-op partners include Amazon, Apple, Fidelity Investments, IBM, and McKinsey & Company, Inc., providing valuable industry experience.
• Diverse skill development in optimization, machine learning, SQL databases, data mining, and data visualization techniques.
- Additional deadlines: 6月1日
tags: Data Analytics, Engineering, Statistics, Machine Learning, Interdisciplinary

material_requirements: transcripts；Resumes or Curriculum Vitae ；Statement of Purpose； recommendations；

• Experiential Cooperative Education Program (Co-op) with 4-8 month placements at major companies like Amazon, Apple, and IBM.
• 32-credit curriculum covers optimization, machine learning, big data algorithms, and data visualization, including a required research project.
• Prepares professionals for data-driven decision-making across diverse sectors, including healthcare, smart manufacturing, and finance.
• Offers significant tuition scholarships: up to 50% for eligible domestic Canadian students and 25% for all admitted COE MS students.
tags: Data Analytics, Statistics, Machine Learning, Data Visualization, Interdisciplinary

program_detail: 专为不符合东北大学所需研究生学位课程英语语言入学要求的国际学生而设计。可获取F1签证。成功完成课程要求并满足升学要求后，您将被录取到您选择的研究生学位课程。

more_info:

• Curriculum develops practical skills: statistics, business intelligence, advanced analytics, data governance, and ethics.
• Career readiness through project portfolio, preparing for diverse entry-to-mid-level analyst roles.

program_detail: 计划强调数据科学的数学基础以及数据分析，计算和 可视化。课程将包括有关机器学习原理和基础等主题的高级课程， 图与网络、数值线性代数、数值优化、拓扑数据分析。
material_requirements: transcripts；Resumes or Curriculum Vitae ；Statement of Purpose； recommendations；
more_info:
• Strong interdisciplinary focus across mathematics, computer science, and statistics.
• Diverse faculty research: machine learning, high-dimensional data, network analysis, Bayesian analysis, data privacy.
• Erdős Institute affiliation: offers data science bootcamps, career coaching, interview prep, and industry connections.
• Emphasis on mathematical underpinnings: deep understanding of machine learning and data analysis algorithms.

- Additional deadlines: 4月30日
tags: Mathematics, Financial Mathematics, Biomathematics, Data Science, Interdisciplinary
grad_requirement: Qualifying examination, doctoral candidacy exam, and dissertation are required.

program_detail: 计划强调数据科学的数学基础以及数据分析，计算和 可视化。课程将包括有关机器学习原理和基础等主题的高级课程， 图与网络、数值线性代数、数值优化、拓扑数据分析。
material_requirements: transcripts；Resumes or Curriculum Vitae ；Statement of Purpose； recommendations；
more_info:
• Interdisciplinary MS in Data Science with four concentrations: Computer Science, Mathematics, Scientific Computing, or Statistics.
• Core curriculum in mathematics, machine learning, statistics, data ethics, and databases.
• Faculty research expertise includes machine learning, high-dimensional data, network analysis, and data privacy.
• Career preparation for high-demand roles across diverse sectors, with master's graduates expecting six-figure starting salaries.
• Research opportunities in data assimilation for science and engineering, including AI/ML tools for weather prediction.
- Additional deadlines: 4月30日
tags: Mathematics, Pure Mathematics, Applied And Computational Mathematics, Financial Mathematics, Biomathematics, Data Science, Interdisciplinary

program_detail: 强调数据管理和统计方法应用的实践培训，以及数据管理、计算和分析软件的使用，以培养高就业率的硕士学位学生。在该计划中，学生将获得应用统计方法的背景，并熟练掌握 SAS 和 R 软件包，以解决政府和行业面临的数据驱动决策中最常见的数据管理和分析问题。
gre_req: 免除，25年要求以官网为准
academic_background: 申请人有先修课程要求，请见招生网址
material_requirements: transcripts；Resumes or Curriculum Vitae ；Statement of Purpose； recommendations；
more_info:
• Hands-on training: Emphasizes practical application of statistical methods with computational and analytic software.
• Software proficiency: Develops mastery in SAS and R for data management and analysis, enhancing employability.
• Industry-focused curriculum: Includes a capstone project and professional skills seminar for career readiness.
• SAS certification option: Simultaneous attainment of a SAS certificate boosts career prospects.
• Accelerated completion: Designed for completion in three semesters, totaling 32 credit hours.

- Additional deadlines: 7月1日
tags: Statistics, Data Science, Biostatistics, Applied Statistics, Interdisciplinary
grad_requirement: Capstone project required or thesis option available.

program_detail: 学生将学习处理大数据的最先进方法，接触为下一代大数据技术奠定基础的前沿方法和理论，并将完成一个项目来展示他们对数据基本概念的使用科学。
academic_background: 计算机科学、数学、统计学、工程、自然科学或相关领域获得认可的学院或大学的四年制学士学位
material_requirements: transcripts；Resumes or Curriculum Vitae ；Statement of Purpose； recommendations；

• Culminating capstone project and poster presentation at the annual Data Science Poster Fair.

• ABET-accredited curriculum, ensuring rigorous academic and professional standards.

material_requirements: transcripts；Resumes or Curriculum Vitae ；Statement of Purpose； recommendations；
more_info:
The Master of Science in Information Science (MSIS) program at the University of Pittsburgh focuses on the intersection of information, networks, and human behavior, preparing graduates for careers across various industries.

Here are the key selling points:
*   Seven areas of concentration: Big Data Analytics, Database and Web Systems, Geoinformatics, Human Centered Computing, Information Security, Telecommunications and Distributed Systems, and General.
*   Curriculum flexibility allows up to 6 elective credits for independent study or practicum experiences, including cross-registration or doctoral seminars.
*   Strong career services support, including career resources, a job board, and post-graduate outcomes information.
*   Students typically complete the master's degree within 1-2 years of full-time study.
*   No GRE requirement; the GRE is optional for admission consideration.

program_name: Dual M.S. Degree program in Statistical Science and Data Science
program_detail: 适用于具有统计学背景并希望获得深厚计算技能的学生。该课程的学生同时满足数据科学和统计科学硕士课程的要求，并在 3 年或更短的时间内获得这两个学位。
academic_background: 拥有认可大学的学士或硕士学位。学术准备应包括至少两门统计学本科课程，一些数学背景，包括多元微积分和线性代数课程，以及对计算机编程的一些熟悉。
material_requirements: transcripts；Resumes or Curriculum Vitae ；Statement of Purpose； recommendations；
more_info:
The browsed page provides a good overview of the Dual M.S. program. I can extract several key selling points directly from this page.

Here's what I found:
*   **Dual Degree:** Students receive both an M.S. in Statistical Science and an M.S. in Data Science.
*   **Efficiency:** The program saves 9 credit hours compared to completing both degrees individually, allowing completion in 3 or fewer years.
*   **Computational Skills Focus:** Designed for students with a statistics background who seek deep computational skills.
*   **Diverse Coursework:** Includes specific credits in Data Mining and Search, Data Management and Engineering, Data Visualization and Storytelling, and various domain specializations (e.g., Economic Data Analytics, Health and Biomedical Data Science, Social Data Science).
*   **Interdisciplinary:** Courses span multiple departments (CSCI, ENGR, INFO, ILS, DSCI, STAT).

I think I have enough information for 3-5 bullet points. I will prioritize the unique aspects of this dual degree program.

1.  Dual M.S. degrees: Statistical Science and Data Science.
2.  Streamlined curriculum; 9-credit hour savings allows completion in three or fewer years.
3.  Comprehensive coursework covering data mining, management, visualization, and domain specializations.
4.  Focus on deep computational skills for students with a statistics background.
• Dual M.S. degrees in Statistical Science and Data Science.
• Streamlined curriculum provides 9-credit hour savings, completing degrees in three years or fewer.
• Core coursework covers data mining, management, and visualization.
• Diverse domain specializations include Economic Data Analytics and Health and Biomedical Data Science.
• Enhances statistical backgrounds with deep computational skills for data-intensive careers.
tags: Statistics, Data Science, Interdisciplinary

*   Applied curriculum: Trains students in data collection, management, analytics, and scalable data-driven discovery, with an emphasis on practical applications.

*   STEM-OPT eligible: Allows international students to apply for a 24-month STEM OPT extension, enhancing career opportunities.
*   Specialization options: Elective courses enable specialization in areas like machine learning, computer vision, NLP, and bioinformatics.

• One-year completion: Designed for efficient completion in a single calendar year.

academic_background: 具有强大数学或计算机科学背景的申请人。申请人必须拥有任一领域的本科学位，并满足几个数学先决条件。熟悉 Python、R 或 MatLab 等编程语言是一个加分项，但不是必需的。
material_requirements: transcripts；Resumes or Curriculum Vitae ；Statement of Purpose； recommendations；
more_info:
The browsed page provides a lot of information. I will extract the key selling points:

**Academic:**
*   Fuses theoretical knowledge with practical skills applicable to various careers.
*   Core curriculum infused with AI electives and hands-on education opportunities.
*   Optional research or clinical thesis available.
*   Concentrations in Fundamentals of Data Science, Data Acquisition and Management, Data Security, and Business Applications.
*   State-of-the-Art Research Labs and Facilities, including MakerCenter and Prototype and Object Fabrication Lab.
*   Research opportunities with renowned faculty, labs, and industry partnerships.

**Career-Oriented:**
*   Graduates recruited by top companies like Amazon, Bank of America, and Disney.
*   Located 15 minutes from Manhattan, offering networking and recruitment with global tech and financial institutions.
*   Graduate Cooperative Education Program available with two tracks (research or augmented on-campus experience).
*   STEM-designated degree program, opening doors for extended stay for international students (OPT/CPT available).
*   97% employed within 3 months of graduation (Class of 2023 Data Science).
*   Mean compensation of program graduates: $109,571 (Class of 2023).
*   Ranked #33 nationally by Fortune in 2025 for Data Science programs.

Now, I will condense these into 3-5 crisp bullet points, each ≤ 25 words.

*   Curriculum fuses theoretical knowledge with practical skills, including AI electives and hands-on education.
*   Optional research/clinical thesis available, supported by state-of-the-art labs and renowned faculty research.
*   Graduate Cooperative Education Program offers research or augmented on-campus industry experience.
*   STEM-designated program, with 97% employment within three months and average salary of $109,571.
*   Strategic location near Manhattan provides networking and recruitment with global tech/financial institutions.

These points cover academic rigor, research opportunities, practical experience, career outcomes, and location advantage.

material_requirements: transcripts；Resumes or Curriculum Vitae ；Statement of Purpose； recommendations；
more_info:
The browse results provide a good amount of information, especially from the `stat.uiowa.edu` link which details the PhD program structure and concentration areas.

Here's what I've gathered:
*   **Ph.D. program:**
    *   **Main research areas/concentrations:** Biostatistics, Probability/Mathematical Statistics, Data Science, and Actuarial Science/Financial Mathematics.
    *   **Interdisciplinary links:** Students can take coursework/seminars in other departments to relate specialization to other fields.
    *   **Research component:** Requires a dissertation, with a prospectus and defense.
    *   **Funding:** All applicants are considered for financial support, including graduate assistantships (research assistants, teaching assistants, graders).
*   **MS program (relevant as it's often a stepping stone to PhD):**
    *   The MS in Statistics is offered without a thesis.
    *   Students typically admit to MS first, then proceed to PhD.

I need to condense this into 3-5 concise bullet points, focusing on *key academic and career-oriented selling points*.

Let's formulate the bullets:
*   Ph.D. concentrations in Biostatistics, Data Science, Probability/Mathematical Statistics, and Actuarial Science/Financial Mathematics.
*   Interdisciplinary coursework opportunities linking statistical specialization to other academic fields.
*   Comprehensive financial support available through graduate assistantships for all applicants.
*   Rigorous doctoral research culminating in a dissertation with a qualifying and comprehensive exam.

These four points seem to cover the main academic and career advantages without being too generic. They also fit the word count and formatting requirements.
• Ph.D. concentrations in Biostatistics, Data Science, Probability/Mathematical Statistics, and Actuarial Science/Financial Mathematics.
• Interdisciplinary coursework opportunities linking statistical specialization to other academic fields.
• Comprehensive financial support available through graduate assistantships for all applicants.
• Rigorous doctoral research culminating in a dissertation with a qualifying and comprehensive exam.
- Additional deadlines: 4月15日
department: College of Liberal Arts and Sciences
tags: Statistics, Biostatistics, Data Science, Actuarial Science, Interdisciplinary
grad_requirement: MS final exam, PhD qualifying procedure, comprehensive exam (prospectus), and a dissertation with a final defense are required.

more_info:
The Master of Science in Data Science program at the University of Iowa appears to be a professional master's program, given its focus on "analytical and technical skills to explore, formulate, and solve complex data-driven problems in science, industry, business, and government". It also mentions a required capstone project and students potentially substituting the practicum with an internship/summer work experience.

Here are the key selling points extracted:

*   30-semester hour curriculum with core courses in probability, statistics, data management, and visualization.
*   Required capstone project for hands-on problem-solving, communication skills, and data ethics.
*   Electives from Statistics, Computer Science, Business Analytics, and Biostatistics for specialized skill development.
*   Practicum (DATA:5890) or approved internship/summer work experience requirement.
*   Data Science Bootcamps and an Annual Hawkeye Datathon for practical experience.
• 30-semester hour curriculum with core courses in probability, statistics, data management, and visualization.
• Required capstone project focusing on real-world problem-solving, communication, and data ethics.
• Elective options across Statistics, Computer Science, Business Analytics, and Biostatistics departments.
• Includes a practicum or approved internship/summer work experience for hands-on application.
• Annual Hawkeye Datathon and data science bootcamps provide practical experience and skill development.
department: College of Liberal Arts and Sciences
tags: Data Science, Statistics, Computer Science, Mathematics, Interdisciplinary
grad_requirement: Capstone project and practicum or internship required.

more_info:
The content from both URLs is largely consistent and provides details about the Master of Science (MS) program in Data Science.

Here's a breakdown of the selling points found:

**Academic Master's (MS in Data Science):**
*   **Curriculum:** Covers fundamentals like probability and statistics, data storage/management, visualization, exploration, modeling, analysis, and uncertainty quantification.
*   **Hands-on Experience:** Includes a required capstone project for solving real-world problems, communication skills, and data ethics.
*   **Electives:** Students can choose electives from Statistics and Actuarial Science, Computer Science, Business Analytics, and Biostatistics departments.
*   **Practicum/Internship:** A "MS Data Science Practicum" (DATA:5890) is required, but students can substitute it with an appropriate internship/summer work experience with advisor approval.
*   **Datathon:** The program includes "Data Science Bootcamps" each fall, concluded by an annual "Hawkeye Datathon".
*   **Flexibility:** The program can be completed in three or four semesters.
*   **No GRE required:** For admission, GRE is not required.

• Practicum/internship option: required practicum can be substituted by an approved internship or summer work experience.
• Annual Datathon: participation in Data Science Bootcamps culminating in the Hawkeye Datathon event.

• Equips students with foundational skills and state-of-the-art technologies for big data applications.

program_name: Data Science and Engineering – Data Science Option
program_detail: 该计划为学生在数据科学和工程领域的职业生涯做好准备，其中有价值的见解来自大量的原始数据。我们的课程在理论和应用之间提供平衡，为学生提供与下一代大数据应用相关的基本技能和最先进的方法。该计划融合了数据挖掘、机器学习和统计学习等核心主题的研究生课程，并包括各种选修课和顶峰体验，学生将他们的知识和技能应用于现实世界的应用场景.
material_requirements: transcripts ；Letters of Recommendation；Personal Statements；Curriculum Vitae or resume
more_info:
• Interdisciplinary Curriculum: Jointly offered by the College of Sciences and Mathematics and the Samuel Ginn College of Engineering.
• Industry Capstone Project: Opportunity for students to complete a capstone project with an industry leader.
• Core Data Science Skills: Focus on data mining, machine learning, and statistical learning for big data applications.
• Specialized Options: Offers distinct Data Engineering and Data Science specializations.

academic_background: 学生必须具有线性（矩阵）代数和多变量微积分的坚实基础，以及一些统计学背景。
material_requirements: transcripts；Resumes or Curriculum Vitae ；Statement of Purpose； recommendations；
more_info:
• Data Science Concentration: A dedicated specialization for challenging research opportunities in industrial, corporate, and academic settings.
• NSF-funded Sports Analytics Research: Involvement in a $1.1 million NSF grant preparing next-generation data scientists via sports analytics.
• Interdisciplinary Consulting Practicum: Required practicum offering practical experience with university offices, clinical trials, and cross-disciplinary faculty collaborations.
• Broad Elective Options: Flexible coursework across computer science, economics, biology, and other fields supports diverse research interests.
• Stipend-Supported Opportunities: Competitive graduate assistantships and tuition waivers for practicum experiences and teaching roles.
tags: Statistics, Data Science, Biostatistics, Interdisciplinary, Research
grad_requirement: Consulting-teaching practicum, dissertation, computer proficiency, and a preliminary examination are required.

program_detail: 对于具有技术背景的学生： 您将从提供机器学习、数据密集型计算、大规模数据管理、算法和数据伦理、数据可视化和认知系统方面的实践重点但技术严谨的培训的课程中进行选择。对于没有技术背景的学生：您将学习如何管理和利用数据资产进行实际决策和问题解决、建模和相关活动。学习计划为您提供应用数据科学主题的全面概述，包括数据组织和管理、挖掘、检索、可视化和分析。

• STEM-designated program with strong employment outlook, preparing graduates for diverse industries including healthcare and finance.

program_detail: 能够有效地处理和理解这些数据已成为计算机科学中的一项关键科学挑战。人们不仅必须能够紧凑地存储此类信息，而且还必须开发算法以有效地处理这些信息和智能系统，该系统可以推理这些数据以找到有趣的模式或做出决策。这些主题构成了数据管理和分析轨道的核心。
